translations: n.三轮脚踏车（tricycle 的复数）

phrs.translation: 机动三轮车；三轮摩托车

sentences.translation: 这些自行车叫做三轮车。

sentences.sentence: I was amazed to see that many people were riding their old-fashioned tricycles.
sentences.translation: 看到许多人都骑着老式三轮车，我很惊奇。

sentences.sentence: Many pedal their tricycles, but most of them prefer to push or drag them.
sentences.translation: 很多孩子用脚蹬车，但多数孩子更愿意推或是拉着三轮车。
